exploreUrl:
<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
eval(String(source.header).replace(/<.*?>/g,''));
var Headers = JSON.parse(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers")).replace(Get('url'), baseUrl));
Headers.Authorization = ('Bearer ' + cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "token"))) || '';
var Option = {
    "method": "GET",
    "headers": Headers
};
var exploreUrl = [];
Account = (cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) ? cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) : Map('账号：');
if(String(Account).length > 0) {
    if (!cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "token")) || cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "token")) == '') {
        Login();
    }
    if(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1")) && String(cache.get(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"))).length > 0) {                                        
        cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "Account_1"), Account);
        exploreUrl.push(explore('✣【' + Account + '】✣', '', 1, 1, false));
        exploreUrl.push(explore('我的订阅', `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api')}}/app/v1/comic/sub/list?status=0&firstLetter=&page={{page}}&size=20,${JSON.stringify(Option)}`, 1, 0.25, false));
        //exploreUrl.push(explore('浏览历史', `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api')}}/app/v1/comic/sub/list?status=0&firstLetter=&page={{page}}&size=20,${JSON.stringify(Option)}`, 1, 0.25, false));
    }
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
T = `{{Get('t')}}`;
U = `{{Get('u')}}`;
url1 = `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api')}}/app/v1/comic/rank/list?tag_id=0&by_time=${U}&rank_type=${T}&page={{page+1}}`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('人气', url1, 1, 0.25, false));
url2 = `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api')}}/app/v1/comic/rank/list?tag_id=0&by_time=${U}&rank_type=${T}&page={{page+1}}`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('吐槽', url2, 1, 0.25, false));
url3 = `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api')}}/app/v1/comic/rank/list?tag_id=0&by_time=${U}&rank_type=${T}&page={{page+1}}`;
exploreUrl.push(explore('订阅', url3, 1, 0.25, false));
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
var Url = Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api') + '/app/v1/comic/filter/classify';
var kind = JSON.parse(java.ajax(Url)).data.classifyList[0].list;
R = `{{Get('r')+1}}`;
Cate = `{{get('cate',Get('o'))}}`;
Status = `{{get('status',Get('p'))}}`;
Zone = `{{get('zone',Get('q'))}}`;
for (i in kind) {
    url = `{{Get('url').replace(/www/, 'v4api')}}/app/v1/comic/filter/list?theme=${kind[i].tagId}&cate=${Cate}&status=${Status}&zone=${Zone}&sortType=${R}&page={{page}}&size=20`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(kind[i].tagName, url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
BID = (kind.length % 3) < 1 ? 0 : (3 - (kind.length % 3));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.25, false)); 
}
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);
</js>

    "proxy": Proxy.some(value => parseInt(value, 10) == parseInt(Get('ci0'), 10)) ? '' : Proxy[0],
}
cache.put(java.md5Encode16(Get('url') + "headers"),JSON.stringify(headers));
JSON.stringify(headers);

    '完结漫画',
    '连载漫画'
];

    'wanjie',
    'lianzai'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/${orderby[i]}/index_{{page-1}}.html`;

}

title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';

kind = [

];
tag = [

];

}

bookSourceComment:
感谢 @柚屿.  提供方法
by天天的鸟蛋蛋 修改简介
提供的原方法
<js>
name = java.getString("h1@text")
author = java.getString("class.module-info-item-content.0@a@text") 
kind = java.getString("class.module-info-tag@text").replace("\/",",") 
lastchapter = java.getString("class.module-info-item-content.3@text").replace("更新至","") 
i = java.getString("class.module-info-introduction-content@text").replace("　　","　　简介：")
t = java.getStringList("#y-playList@span@text")
r = java.getStringList("#y-playList@small@text")
v = book.getVariable("custom") !="" ? book.getVariable("custom") : "0"
if(v > t.length || v < 0) { v = Math.floor(Math.random() * n.length); }
java.put("v",v)
n = "接口: "
for (o = 0; o < t.length; o++) {
  f = t[o] + "(共 " + r[o] + " 集)" + "，"
  n += f
}
intro = i + "\n" + n + "\n注:填写书籍变量，刷新详情页切换正文接口,默认接口为0，若填写数字超出接口范围，会随机调用。\n当前接口: " + t[v] + "  共 "+r[v]+" 集"
cover = java.getString("class.module-item-pic.0@img@data-original") 
url = ""
JSON.stringify({
  name: name,
  author: author,
  kind: kind,
  lastchapter: lastchapter,
  intro: intro,
  cover: cover,
  url: url
})
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
name = java.getString("h4@text")


author = java.getString("class.detail_imform_value.0@text") 


kind = java.getString("class.detail_imform_value.-1@text").replace("\/",",")


lastchapter = "" 


i = java.getString("class.detail_imform_desc_pre@html")


v = book.getVariable("custom") !="" ? book.getVariable("custom") : "0"


v = parseInt(v)


t = java.getStringList("#menu0@li@text")


Urls = java.getElements("#main0@div@ul"); 


if(v >= t.length || v < 0) { v = Math.floor(Math.random() * t.length); }


urls = Urls[v].select('li')


java.put("list", urls)


n = ""


for (o = 0; o < t.length; o++) {
  
  urls = Urls[o].select('li')

  f = "❤序号🔺" + o + "🔻【" + t[o] + "】 \n路线：" + t[o] + " \n最新章节：第" + urls.length + "集\n"
  n += f
}


usage = "\n📌使用说明： 根据序号设置书籍变量来切换来源(默认0)，若填写数字超出接口范围，会随机调用\n"


currentSource = "🎯当前源：序号🔺" + v + "🔻【" + t[v] + "】 (默认)\n"


intro = i + "\n" + usage + currentSource + n


cover = java.getString("class.blockcontent.0@img@src")

url = ""


JSON.stringify({
  name: name,
  author: author,
  kind: kind,
  lastchapter: lastchapter,
  intro: intro,
  cover: cover,
  url: url
})

</js>

<js>
eval(String(source.loginUrl));
var exploreUrl = [];
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  榜　　单  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
rank = [
    '精品榜',
    '人气榜',
    '推荐榜',
    '黑马榜',
    '新更新',
    '新漫画'
];
for (i in rank) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/rank/${parseInt(i)+1}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(rank[i], url, 1, 0.25, false));
}
title = '✣　　　　　  ✣  标　　签  ✣  　　　　　✣';
exploreUrl.push(explore(title, '', 1, 1, false));
sort = [
    '冒险','热血','都市','玄幻','悬疑','耽美','恋爱','生活',
    '搞笑','穿越','修真','后宫','女主','古风','连载','完结'
];
for (i in sort) {
    url = `{{Get('url')}}/sort/${parseInt(i)+1}`;
    exploreUrl.push(explore(sort[i], url, 1, 0.2, false));
}
BID = (sort.length % 4) < 1 ? 0 : (4 - (sort.length % 4));
for (i = 0; i < BID; i++) {
   exploreUrl.push(explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false)); 
}
//exploreUrl.splice(52, 0, explore('', '', 1, 0.2, false));
JSON.stringify(exploreUrl);
</js>
